flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=13>>13 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 13 fruits) for a total of 13+4 = <<4+13=17>>17 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+13+17 = <<9+13+17=39>>39 fruits

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
